------------------------
Description in English 
------------------------		
 In this drama directed and co-written by Claire Denis, Isabelle Huppert plays Maria, a white woman living in an African nation that is desending into chaos. Maria owns a coffee plantation and regards the property as her personal domain; she would rather fight than give up her land. Though her stubborn attitude may be putting those close to her in danger as the country falls into chaos and her very life is under threat.

A searing and beautiful story of a land ravaged by chaos and greed
